plurals.name: MediaSendActivity_cant_share_more_than_n_items
plurals.item: You can\'t share more than %d item.
You can\'t share more than %d items.

resources.string: To capture photos and video, allow Hahalolo access to the camera.
Hahalolo needs the Camera permission to take photos or video, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Camera\".
Hahalolo needs Camera permissions to take photos or video
An item was removed because it exceeded the size limit
Tap here to make this message disappear after it is viewed.

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_error_while_saving_attachments_to_sd_card
plurals.item: Error while saving attachment to storage!
Error while saving attachments to storage!

plurals.name: ConversationFragment_saving_n_media_to_storage_warning
plurals.item: Saving this media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access it.\n\nContinue?
Saving all %1$d media to storage will allow any other apps on your device to access them.\n\nContinue?

resources.string: Unable to save to external storage without permissions
Enable the microphone permission to capture videos with sound.
Hahalolo needs microphone permissions to record videos, but they have been denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Microphone\" and \"Camera\".
Hahalolo needs microphone permissions to record videos.
Tap for photo, hold for video
New: Blur faces or draw anywhere to blur
Draw to blur additional faces or areas
Hahalolo needs the Storage permission in order to save to external storage, but it has been permanently denied. Please continue to app settings, select \"Permissions\", and enable \"Storage\".
